sentences.english: Lishui City Planning Exhibition Hall warmly welcomes your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 丽水市城市规划展览馆竭诚欢迎您的到来。

sentences.english: Workshop director of high-strength comrades wholeheartedly welcome customers to negotiate business.

sentences.english: We welcome the broad masses of old and new customers continue to support the Company.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎广大的新老客户继续支持本公司。

sentences.english: Provide dedicated glass art, collectibles and silverware tall.

sentences.english: We warmly welcomer customers all over the world to choose our products.
sentences.chinese: 我们竭诚欢迎国内外新老用户选用我公司产品。

sentences.english: I wish you a gay and merry Christmas. All emotion and finest wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我所有的爱心与竭诚祝你及全家圣诞快乐。

sentences.english: His life was one single service for Germany.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生是为德意志竭诚服务的一生。

sentences.english: Hoping that there will be opportunities for the broad masses of the dedication of the consignors to provide quality and thoughtful service.
sentences.chinese: 希望能有机会竭诚的为广大货主提供优质周到的服务。

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome the traders to come here and talk business…
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎广大国内外客户来人来函洽谈业务。

sentences.english: We welcome new and old customers work together, mutual benefit and create a better future.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎新老客户携手合作，相互共赢，共创未来。

sentences.english: We welcome your choice of Keda products.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎您选用科达产品。

sentences.english: We are one of the leading centres for academic trip and related cross-culture activities.
sentences.chinese: 我们竭诚为您提供领先的学术交流和跨文化交流活动。

sentences.english: I do a good job of the Secretary for products, the principles of good aroma, for your dedicated service.
sentences.chinese: 我司本着做好产品，做好香熏的原则，竭诚为你服务。

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome friends from various circles at home and abroad visit the guide and experiment.

sentences.english: Provides the high quality product and the consummation post-sale service wholeheartedly for the customer.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚为客户提供优质的产品和完善的售后服务。

sentences.english: With all sincerity welcome domestic and international the medical treatment field personage bearer your letter talks guide.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎国内外医疗界人士来人来函洽谈指导。

definition: to resolve a difficult situation and leave worries behind (idiom)
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
concerted efforts in a common cause (idiom); united and working together
